ComicInfo.Summary:
The Monster Mayor -- U.S.A.: Joel Belmont turns down a request to run for mayor of the town his father founded, but after the Green Glob affects him, he sees the town's current leaders as monsters, reflecting their true natures, and changes his mind about running.
The Wizard's Dream-Beast: An evil wizard tries to eliminate the rightful heir to an inheritance.
Bodyguard to a Blonde: Automan must protect an actress who mistakenly picked up a suitcase belonging to an enemy spy.
ComicInfo.Title: The Monster Mayor -- U.S.A.; The Wizard's Dream-Beast; Bodyguard to a Blonde
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
